nodes.id: 中国人民解放军东部战区陆军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军东部战区陆军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军东部战区的陆军组成部分，机关驻地福州市。
description.en: The ground force component of the Eastern Theater Command of the People's Liberation Army, with its headquarters in Fuzhou.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的陆上武装力量，是中国人民解放军东部战区陆军的领导机构之一。
description.en: The ground force of the People's Liberation Army and one of the leading bodies of the PLA Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军东部战区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军东部战区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的战区之一，是中国人民解放军东部战区陆军的领导机构之一。
description.en: One of the theater commands of the People's Liberation Army and one of the leading bodies of the PLA Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军南京军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军南京军区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军已撤销的七个大军区之一，其部队构成了新成立的东部战区陆军的基础。
description.en: One of the seven former military regions of the People's Liberation Army, whose troops formed the basis of the newly established Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任东部战区陆军司令员。
description.en: A lieutenant general in the People's Liberation Army, served as commander of the Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，现任东部战区陆军政治委员。
description.en: A lieutenant general in the People's Liberation Army, currently serving as the political commissar of the Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席，向东部战区等五大战区授予军旗并发布训令。
description.en: Then General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, President of the PRC, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission, who presented flags and gave instructions to the five major theater commands, including the Eastern Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，东部战区陆军首任司令员。
description.en: A lieutenant general in the People's Liberation Army, the first commander of the Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任东部战区陆军司令员。
description.en: A lieutenant general in the People's Liberation Army, served as commander of the Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任东部战区陆军司令员。
description.en: A lieutenant general in the People's Liberation Army, served as commander of the Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，东部战区陆军首任政治委员。
description.en: A lieutenant general in the People's Liberation Army, the first political commissar of the Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任东部战区陆军政治委员。
description.en: A lieutenant general in the People's Liberation Army, served as the political commissar of the Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十一集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十一集团军

description.zh-cn: 隶属东部战区陆军的集团军，军部驻江苏徐州。
description.en: A group army subordinate to the Eastern Theater Command Ground Force, with its headquarters in Xuzhou, Jiangsu.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十二集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十二集团军

description.zh-cn: 隶属东部战区陆军的集团军，军部驻浙江湖州。
description.en: A group army subordinate to the Eastern Theater Command Ground Force, with its headquarters in Huzhou, Zhejiang.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军

description.zh-cn: 隶属东部战区陆军的集团军，军部驻福建厦门。
description.en: A group army subordinate to the Eastern Theater Command Ground Force, with its headquarters in Xiamen, Fujian.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军东部战区陆军机关驻地。
description.en: The headquarters location of the PLA Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首都，中国人民解放军战区成立大会在此举行。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China, where the founding ceremony of the PLA Theater Commands was held.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京，是中国人民解放军战区成立大会的举办地。
description.en: Located in Beijing, the venue for the founding ceremony of the PLA Theater Commands.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的主要负责人，习近平在战区成立时担任此职务。
description.en: The head of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, a position held by Xi Jinping at the time of the establishment of the theater commands.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家元首，习近平在战区成立时担任此职务。
description.en: The head of state of the People's Republic of China, a position held by Xi Jinping at the time of the establishment of the theater commands.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会的负责人，习近平在战区成立时担任此职务。
description.en: The head of the Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China, a position held by Xi Jinping at the time of the establishment of the theater commands.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，曾任东部战区陆军副司令员。
description.en: A major general in the People's Liberation Army, served as deputy commander of the Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，曾任东部战区陆军副司令员。
description.en: A major general in the People's Liberation Army, served as deputy commander of the Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，曾任东部战区陆军副司令员。
description.en: A major general in the People's Liberation Army, served as deputy commander of the Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，曾任东部战区陆军副政治委员。
description.en: A major general in the People's Liberation Army, served as deputy political commissar of the Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，曾任东部战区陆军副政治委员。
description.en: A major general in the People's Liberation Army, served as deputy political commissar of the Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，曾任东部战区陆军参谋长。
description.en: A major general in the People's Liberation Army, served as chief of staff of the Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，曾任东部战区陆军参谋长。
description.en: A major general in the People's Liberation Army, served as chief of staff of the Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军三界合同战术训练基地

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军东部战区陆军直属单位。
description.en: A unit directly subordinate to the PLA Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

description.en: A unit directly subordinate to the PLA Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军东部战区陆军直属单位。

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军东部战区陆军直属部队。
description.en: A unit directly subordinate to the PLA Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军远程火箭炮兵第一旅

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军远程火箭炮兵第一旅

description.en: A unit directly subordinate to the PLA Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军东部战区陆军
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军东部战区陆军由中国人民解放军陆军领导机构领导。
description.en: The PLA Eastern Theater Command Ground Force is led by the PLA Ground Force headquarters.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军东部战区陆军
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军东部战区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军东部战区陆军是中国人民解放军东部战区的组成部分。
description.en: The PLA Eastern Theater Command Ground Force is a component of the PLA Eastern Theater Command.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军南京军区
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军东部战区陆军

description.zh-cn: 东部战区陆军部队主要来自原南京军区。
description.en: The troops of the Eastern Theater Command Ground Force primarily came from the former Nanjing Military Region.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军东部战区

description.zh-cn: 在2016年2月1日的战区成立大会上，习近平向东部战区等五大战区授予军旗并发布训令，标志其正式成立。
description.en: At the theater command establishment ceremony on February 1, 2016, Xi Jinping presented flags and gave instructions to the five major theater commands, including the Eastern Theater Command, marking their official establishment.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十一集团军
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军东部战区陆军

description.zh-cn: 陆军第七十一集团军隶属于东部战区陆军。
description.en: The 71st Group Army is subordinate to the Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十二集团军
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军东部战区陆军

description.zh-cn: 陆军第七十二集团军隶属于东部战区陆军。
description.en: The 72nd Group Army is subordinate to the Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军东部战区陆军

description.zh-cn: 陆军第七十三集团军隶属于东部战区陆军。
description.en: The 73rd Group Army is subordinate to the Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.
